headline: Centrus Announces "At-the-Market" Equity Offering Program
summary: Centrus Energy Corp. (NYSE American: LEU) ("Centrus") today announced that it has entered into an at-the-market ("ATM") equity offering sales agreement (the "Sales Agreement"), under which Centrus may, from time to time, offer and sell shares of its Class A common stock (the "Class A Common Stock") having an aggregate offering price of up to $1,000,000,000 (the "Shares"), through or to any of the sales agents named therein.
